content: a trio of coffee cup cozies featuring twisted stitch cables designed to fit an array of cup sizes to keep your hands cool and your drink warm and fashionable **size** one size **finished measurements** circumference 8 / 20 cm unstretched height 3 5 / 9 cm **yarn** urth yarns monokrom worsted worsted weight 100% extrafine merino 220 yd / 200 m per 100 g skein shown in color 4067 each cozy requires approx 34 yds **needles** us size 5 3 75 mm double pointed needles or long circular for magic loop or size needed to obtain gauge **notions** stitch marker tapestry needle **gauge** 24 sts x 30 row = 4 / 10 cm in pattern after blocking **skill level** advanced beginner **skills required** knitting in the round twisted stitch cabling **share your work** use the hashtag #vanillachaicozies on social media
